title: Gab and Juls: Potter Deserve Brighton Boos?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Chelsea’s 4-1 hammering away to Brighton which saw Graham Potter booed by fans of his former side and ask whether recruitment is the main issue at Stamford Bridge. The guys also discuss Liverpool’s defeat against Leeds, Real Madrid’s surprise draw against Girona and whether Lionel Messi is any closer to moving to Inter Miami and MLS.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Graham Potter booed in Brighton return; Why Liverpool can't get their season going; Messi's potential MLS move
